content: DD 30-W Core drill Compact, light diamond coring machine for wet, handheld coring of heavy-duty anchor and rebar holes from 8-35 mm (5/16 - 1-3/8) in diameter ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond coring- - - ### FEATURES:Features Very low drilling noise – the ideal solution for drilling in inhabited buildings Impact-free drilling reduces the risk of damage to brittle materials and allows drilling close to edges Fast drilling through rebar thanks to the unique TopSpin technology Soft-start feature for precise hole positioning The quick-lock keyless chuck system makes changing core bits quicker and easier than ever Applications Drilling accurate anchor holes and through holes 8 to 35 mm (5/16 - 1-3/8) in diameter Low-noise drilling for setting anchors during renovation work in hospitals, commercial and residential buildings Wet coring in heavily-reinforced concrete, masonry and natural stone Wet coring in brittle materials (marble, tiles, masonry, natural stone) and close to edges ### TECHNICAL DATA: Diameter range: 5/16 - 1-3/8 in Rated input voltage: 120 V Base material: Concrete, Masonry Technical Data | Diameter range | 5/16 - 1-3/8 in | Rated input voltage | 120 V | Base material | Concrete, Masonry | Operation mode | Hand-held and rig-mounted drilling system | Number of gears | 1 | No load RPM | gear 1: 9200 rpm | Weight according EPTA-Procedure 01/2003 without battery | 16.8 lb | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 16.9 x 5 x 9.4 in | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 88 dB (A) | 1 | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) with diamond core A (ah,DD) | 6 m/s² | Tri. vibr. value for drilling into concrete (wet) (ah,DD) - Corebit A | C+ 18/300 SPX-T | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 2043846 - DD 30-W 120V Anchor diameter coring tool - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DD 30-W 120V Diamond coring tool - 1x Wet Adaptor - 1x DD 30-W Tool case assy
